title: NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang's Vision for the Future
topics: Early GPU Innovation and Parallel Processing
CUDA and the Shift to General-Purpose GPU Computing
AlexNet and the Big Breakthrough in Deep Learning
Scaling AI Models and Reinventing the Computing Stack
Future of Robotics and Physical AI
Future Bets in Chips and Transformer Alternatives
summary_brief: Jensen Huang reflects on Nvidia's foundational insights—from parallel processing to CUDA—and outlines how GPUs became the engine for modern AI. He describes the rise of deep learning after AlexNet, the creation of Omniverse and Cosmos for robotics, and predicts a future where physical AI, digital biology, and personal AI tutors profoundly transform daily life.

actions.description_plain: Continue advancing Omniverse + Cosmos integration to accelerate training and deployment of physical AI and humanoid robotics.
Produce follow-up educational content explaining core computing shifts (parallel processing, CUDA, world models) for broad public understanding.
